Description of incident: An MS Excel spreadsheet containing names and Social Security numbers of graduate students at the University was posted within the University's website on or around April 17, 2007.  Specifically, the spreadsheet contained the credit hour and tuition information associated with "inter-college" graduate programs.  In addition to the credit hour and tuition information that were visible at the top of the spreadsheet, the bottom of the report also included the names and Social Security numbers of students. A staff member recognized the mistake on July 27.
